actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 2(b)(1) of the National Housing Act to authorize increases in the dollar amount limitations on the purchase of mobile homes.

summary.text: Amends the National Housing Act to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to increase the dollar limitation on the purchase of mobile homes and for renovation of existing structures for purposes of securing federally-insured loans.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 2(b)(1) of the National Housing Act to authorize increases in the dollar amount limitations on the purchase of mobile homes.
